[c][6bd600][b]Chapter 2: Instigator[/b][-][/c]

You've made contact with a young Freedom Fighter named Khalad, but now the Zirax believe the Tal'on are involved with the UCH.
Time is now against you as you must move quickly to secure the future of the Tal'on people by arming the people with the weapons and technology the Zirax have forbidden them for centuries.
[c][2eafff]IDA, what do you rate the probability that we can drive the zirax off the planet?[-][/c]

[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]Assuming best case scenario, I calculate a 7.2% chance of successfully driving the zirax from this planet, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]However, there remains a 23.9% chance of forcing the zirax forces to retreat into their territory and leave the Tal'on populace alone.[-][/c]
[c][2eafff]Well, a 31% chance of success isn't too bad.[-][/c]

[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00ffee]That is not accounting for allied losses.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]The remaining 68.9% probabilities include mass genocide and total annihilation.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]That is not optimal, Commander. I do not recommend this course of action.[-][/c]
[c][2eafff]Your objections are noted, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]Let's go talk to Khalad and see if we can make those statistics a little more favorable.[-][/c]
Return to the tank and approach Khalad
[c][ffee00][b][ IDA ][/b][-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]Commander, may I remind you that arming civilian personnel with UCH armaments is a violation of UCH Rule: 144-33, subsection-B.[-][/c]

[c][2eafff]Yes, IDA. I know, but subsection-D allows civilians to supply the UCH troops defending them from enemy attack.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]They can't supply us without weapons, so what we're actually doing is planning ahead. How's that?[-][/c]
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]Yes, Commander.\nI believe that explanation will satisfy any official enquiry. You may have trouble convincing the Admiral if he asks though.[-][/c]
[c][2eafff]It's good to know we're both on the same page, IDA.[-][/c]
[c][2eafff]I'll need to get back to camp and get to producing that first batch of Assault Rifles now.[-][/c]

The Tal'on need a supply of modern weapons to hold off any attacks made by the zirax. Bows and Arrows can deal with the occasional trooper, but firearms and explosives are needed to take out Drones and fortifications.

[b][c][ffffff]Craft, Loot or Buy 20 Assault Rifles[-][/c][/b]
[b][c][ff0000]Hold all 20 of them in your inventory[-][/c][/b]
[c][2eafff]Okay, that's the first batch completed. [-][/c][c][2eafff]Only two more to go.[-][/c]

The Tal'on need a supply of modern weapons to hold off any attacks made by the zirax. Bows and Arrows can deal with the occasional trooper, but firearms and explosives are needed to take out Drones and fortifications.

[b][c][ffffff]Craft, Loot or Buy 20 Sniper Rifles[-][/c][/b]
[b][c][ff0000]Hold all 20 of them in your inventory[-][/c][/b]
[c][2eafff]That's the second batch, only one more to go.[-][/c]
[c][2eafff]This should be the last batch of Shotguns.[-][/c]

The Tal'on need a supply of modern weapons to hold off any attacks made by the zirax. Bows and Arrows can deal with the occasional trooper, but firearms and explosives are needed to take out Drones and fortifications.

[b][c][ffffff]Craft, Loot or Buy 20 Shotguns[-][/c][/b]
[b][c][ff0000]Hold all 20 of them in your inventory[-][/c][/b]
[c][2eafff]Okay, that's the last of them.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]IDA, can you open a communication to Khalad? I need to ask him something.[-][/c]
[c][2eafff]Khalad, it's me.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]Do I need to worry about supplying ammunition with these weapons i'm delivering?[-][/c]

[b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]
[c][ffffff]No, i've got plenty of zirax ammunition back at The Tank.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]It's compatible with your UCH weapons, though it'll wear out the barrel quickly.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]I'll bring it by the village and ziggurat when you're done there.[-][/c]
[c][2eafff]Understood, Khalad.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]That's all I needed to know. Thanks.[-][/c]
[c][2eafff]Plotting a course back to the Tal'on Village...[-][/c]
Return to the Tal'on village and give one of the weapons crates to the Shaman Turell.
[c][2eafff]Coming up to the village now.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]Something doesn't seem right...[-][/c]
[c][2eafff]There are more village guards around the village now and they're all armed. [-][/c][c][2eafff]Something's going on...[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]I need to find Turell.[-][/c]
Something is going on in the Tal'ohn village. The village guards have increased and they're all armed. This could be good or it could be bad...\n\n[b][c][ff0000]Bring the Weapons Case[-][/c][/b]
Bring the second Weapon Case to Huntmaster Ku'reil

Ku'reil is the Leader of the Hunters. They are responsible for the protection of the village from roaming predators and the hunting of animals to add to the village's food supplies.
Ku'reil's hunters have been recalled to the village to defend it against a possible zirax attack but they don't have the weaponry capable of dealing with mechanoids and drones.

[b][c][ff0000]Bring a Weapon Case to Huntmaster Ku'reil[-][/c][/b]

[c][2eafff]IDA, it looks like the Zirax are finally starting to make their move on the Tal'on.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]I need you to keep me posted on any troop deployments around the village and ziggurat.[-][/c]

[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]Confirmed, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]There are several patrol units on the ground inside the Tal'on's territory with high thermal signatures. They appear to be idle at this time.[-][/c]

[c][2eafff]If you can intercept their communications, relay the information to Khalad's terminal back at the Tank.[-][/c]\n\n[c][2eafff]I need to bring this last case of weapons to the [-][/c][c][ffffff]Ziggurat[-][/c][c][2eafff].[-][/c]

The Tal'on Hunters and Guardsmen are bringing in the civilians from the outlying buildings to defensible locations like the Village and Ziggurat, but they lack the weapons to deal with Drones and Mechanoids.\n\n[c][ff0000][b]Bring the final Weapons Case to the Tal'on Ziggurat[/b][-][/c]
[c][2eafff]I've reached the Ziggurat.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]It doesn't look like they've closed the gates yet. I need to get inside.[-][/c]
Boff is the gate guard of the temple. You spoke to him before.
Find the shaman in charge of the Room of the Moon in the lower Ziggurat

[c][ff5c5c]Praise not the rebels who rise against our overlords, for they mean to deceive you! Fear and Hate are not just their message, but their weapon. A weapon aimed at the hearts and minds of my people.[-][/c]
[c][ff5c5c]Listen not to their words my followers! Avert your gaze and your hearing from their message.[-][/c]
[c][ff5c5c]Seek instead the blessed guidance of the spirits, so that you may find Empyrion as our ancestors once did before they grew apathetic and neglectful of their spiritual duties.[-][/c]
[c][ff5c5c]Rejoice as the punishment for their sins comes again and washes away the unfaithful and the sinful![-][/c]
[c][2eafff]I have a feeling that this shaman must be Shaman Dolmac; which means i'm gonna have to turn on the charm to get anywhere.[-][/c]

Looks like the Shaman in charge in the Room of the Moon may be Shaman Dolmac.\nIf that's the case, you're going to have to be your most charming and ingratiating in order to sweet talk him into accepting your help.
[c][2eafff]IDA, there is apparently a burial chamber nearby.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]Can you find it on your scans or is it shielded like Khalad's tank?[-][/c]

[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00ffee]I have identified several subterranean structures, Commander.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]Most are small and made of natural limestone and cement, but I am detecting no energy signatures of any kind.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]I have added the largest of the structures to your Heads-Up Display.[-][/c]

The Temple Guardsmen's Oath forbids them from using Zirax weapons, which also includes UCH weapons due to their similarity.\n\nTo get around the oath, Captain Ty'nan of the Temple Guardsmen has sent you to an ancient Tal'on Burial Site to retrieve sealed Tal'on technology from before the purge that will not violate their oaths.
[c][2eafff]This looks like the place, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]Anything on your scans?[-][/c]
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]Nothing, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]I'm afraid you're on your own for this.[-][/c]

Somewhere inside the Tal'on Burial Chamber, alongside the dead is a sealed and shielded container that has the technology the Tal'on hid away when they were first exiled to this planet and forbidden their advanced technology.

[c][ffffff][b]Search the Burial Chamber for the Sealed Casket.[/b][-][/c]
[c][ff0000]You only need one Sealed Crate. If in MP, leave the remaining 2 Crates.[-][/c]

[b][c][ffae00]< Translating Headstone >[-][/c][/b] [b][c][6bd600]Tal'on[-][/c][/b] to [b][c][2eafff]UCH Standard[-][/c][/b]
[c][ffffff]Here lies the final resting place of our once-great civilization's founder: Our technology.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Given pride of place among the dead, buried and soon-to-be forgotten in a tomb that marks the price we paid for our indecision.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]If a time should once again come when these relics are necessary, let it be for the last time.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Kar'han, Tal'on Ambassador to the Zirax, First Chief[-][/c]
[c][2eafff]This is definitely it![-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]Let's blow this cover stone off.[-][/c]

You've found the casket, but it's under these slabs. They look fragile enough to be destroyed with a few shots with a shotgun.

[c][ff0000]You only need one Sealed Crate. If in MP, leave the remaining 2 Crates for other players.[-][/c]
[c][ff0000][-][/c]
[c][ff0000]This task is completed by putting a crate in your INVENTORY. Not your ship.[-][/c]
[c][2eafff]I've got the box, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]How's it looking outside?[-][/c]

[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00ffee]Zirax troops have begun mobilizing around the Ziggurat, Commander.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]They began moving a few moments ago and are headed straight for the Ziggurat.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]Whatever you are planning to do Commander, do it quickly.[-][/c]

Return to the Ziggurat with the Sealed Crate of ancient Tal'on Technology.
The zirax troops have begun mobilizing and it may already be too late by the time you reach the ziggurat.

[b][c][ff0000]Ensure you are well armed and that the Sealed Crate is in your inventory. There will likely be a fighting in and around the temple.[-][/c][/b]
[c][2eafff]I'm not seeing any enemy activity, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]It looks like I made it back before they reached the Ziggurat.[-][/c]
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]It seems so, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]They appeared to be slowed by the unfamiliar terrain.[-][/c]

The zirax's first wave of troops are fast approaching the ziggurat.
The Temple Guardians need the sealed weapons technology you're carrying and they need it now.

[b][c][ff0000]Bring the Sealed Crate to Shaman Dolmac and Captain Ty'nan[-][/c][/b]
[b][c][6bd600][ Captain Ty'nan ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]You have returned, Stranger. And not a moment too soon![-][/c]\n[c][ffffff][i]Come quickly![/i][-][/c]
Bring the Sealed Crate to Shaman Dolmac

You have arrived just in time.
Bring the sealed crate to Shaman Dolmac to open and begin the process of re-arming the Temple Guardians.

[b][c][ff0000]Give the Sealed Crate to Shaman Dolmac[-][/c][/b]

[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00ffee]Commander![-][/c]
[c][00ffee]The enemy troops have begun their attack on the Ziggurat.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]You must withdraw or you will be caught in the fighting.[-][/c]
[c][2eafff]I'm staying, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]It'll take time for them to refit the Guardian's weapons so they'll need me to hold them off until they're ready.[-][/c]
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]I figured you'd say that, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]Since I cannot stop you, the only thing left for me to do is wish you Good Luck.[-][/c]

[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00ffee]I was able to scramble the enemy drones' enemy tracking system, so they are presently engaging a "hostile" mountainside.[-][/c]

[c][00ffee]You can thank me later, Commander.[-][/c]
The zirax are attacking the Ziggurat and you need to hold them off while the shaman refit the Guardians with energy weapons.
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]I have managed to disable several of the enemy's drones, but the rest have recovered and are now heading your way, Commander.[-][/c]
[c][2eafff]Understood, IDA. Good work.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]The second wave of troops are also coming.[-][/c]
[b][c][6bd600][ Captain Ty'nan ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffae00][b]ALL GUARDIANS!! DRAW YOUR WEAPONS!![/b][-][/c]
[b][c][6bd600][ Captain Ty'nan ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]You can stand back now, Commander![-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]We'll take care of the rest of them, leave it to us.[-][/c]

It looks like reinforcements have arrived just in time.\nCaptain Ty'nan and his Advanced Guardians should be able to deal with the rest of the zirax attackers.\nNow you must go inside and speak to Shaman Ur'cera.
[c][2eafff]The Ziggurat has been secured, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]Thanks for all your help with holding back the drones as long as you could. You saved a lot of lives, not just mine.[-][/c]
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]You are... welcome, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]It wouldn't hurt to praise me more in future, considering all that I do.[-][/c]

[b][c][6bd600]Chapter 3: Freedom Fighter[-][/c][/b]

With the help of Khalad, you have successfully armed and defended the Tal'on Village and Ziggurat against a Zirax Attack. But it's not over...
As long as the Zirax are able to deploy more troops and drones, the Tal'on people on this planet will never be safe.

[c][6bd600][b]Chapter 3: Freedom Fighter[/b][-][/c]

With the help of Khalad, you have successfully armed and defended the Tal'on Villages and Ziggurat against a Zirax Attack. But it's not over...
As long as the Zirax are able to deploy more troops and drones, the Tal'on people on this planet will never be safe.

[c][2eafff]It's about time I got out of here and headed back to [-][/c][c][ffee00]The Tank[-][/c][c][2eafff].[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]Khalad's probably had as bad a time as we did, and [i]he's on foot[/i].[-][/c]
[b][c][ffee00]Telemetry Data:[-][/c][/b] A transmission from IDA that includes terrain mapping and target acquisition of ground-based structures.
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]Confirmed, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]Plotting a course back to the Water Tank.[-][/c]
Return to the Ruined water tank

Khalad's base is located inside an ancient reinforced water tank that draws water up from an aquifer deep underground.\nIt is reinforced and shielded against radiation, making it an ideal place to hide from enemy scans.
[c][2eafff]IDA, You were keeping an eye on Khalad's position, right?[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]Did he come back here after delivering the ammunition?[-][/c]

[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]Confirmed, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]Though he failed to deliver the ammunition to the Ziggurat as planned; he returned from the village moments ago.[-][/c]
Khalad is on the lowest level of the Ruined Tank. Speak to him.
[c][2eafff]Do you think Khalad's plan is viable, IDA?[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]I think he may be a bit too optimistic about our chances here.[-][/c]

[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]I calculate that the plan [i]is[/i] viable, Commander. But as you have surmised, there is much room for error on either side.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]As always, proceed with caution.[-][/c]
[c][2eafff]Don't I always?[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]Keep me posted on any potential problems and we [i]should [/i]hopefully be fine.[-][/c]

Approach to 500 meters of the disabled Xenu Convoy and make your way on foot to the convoy while laying low so the Heavy Laser Turret on the lead vehicle doesn't turn you to swiss cheese.

[c][ff0000]Don't complain if you're using Imperial measurements. Those are for Zirax.[-][/c]
[c][ff0000][-][/c]
[c][ffff00][b]SKIP[/b]: You can manually skip the attack on the convoy if you've already destroyed the convoy outside the mission.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]However you cannot progress through the mission without handing the Demolition charges to Khalad at the Tank.[-][/c]
[c][2eafff]Khalad, come in.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]I'm at the right distance and I will proceed [b]on foot from this point on[/b].[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]Are you in position?[-][/c]

[b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]I'm almost there, give me a minute.\nLet me tell you right now that it's [u][i]imperative[/i][/u] that you [-][/c][c][ff0000]stay low[-][/c][c][ffffff] to the ground and avoid hills that put you above the height of the lead vehicle's turret.[-][/c]

[b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]If you fire any heavy weapons at [i]ANY[/i] of the vehicles, you could hit a fuel tank or ammo crate and the entire convoy goes up in a massive explosion.[-][/c]\n[c][ff0000][b]If that happens... it's [u]game over[/u]. That's the end. No more missions.[/b][-][/c]
[c][2eafff]Okay, so no Ships, no big guns and definitely [i]don't[/i] hit the big boxes of explosives: Gotcha![-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]I'm starting on my approach now. Going dark.[-][/c]

The Zirax Convoy has been disabled by land mines placed by Khalad beforehand after scouting the planned route from shipping manifests.
Now, the convoy lies idle while the tracks are being repaired.

The Lead Vehicle is equipped with an [c][ff0000]Imperial Heavy Laser Turret[-][/c]. It is very hard to dodge and will put a hole clean through your ship with each shot.

[c][ff5c5c]The Convoy is carrying fuel and explosives. ANY explosions on [i]any[/i] of the vehicles could trigger the explosives or fuel being carried which will vaporize the entire convoy![-][/c]
[b][c][ff0000]DO NOT SHOOT THE CONVOY!![-][/c][/b]
[c][ffee00]If the convoy is destroyed, you don't get the cargo. The mission fails and you doom the Tal'on on this planet to complete genocide.[-][/c]
[c][6bd600]- If you're playing on a server, the Convoy will regenerate every 60 minutes.[-][/c]

[c][ffff00][b]SKIP[/b]: You can manually skip the attack on the convoy if you've already destroyed the convoy outside the mission.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]However you cannot progress through the mission without handing the Demolition charges to Khalad at the Tank.[-][/c]
[c][2eafff]I've reached the center of the formation.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]I don't see you, so i'll clear the remaining guards while you regroup.[-][/c]
[b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]I got delayed by a few patrols.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]Clear the area and i'll be there in a minute.[-][/c]

Give Khalad a minute to reach the convoy.
He'll be there in a second, but you'll need to make sure the area's secure before he makes his appearance.

[c][ffee00]If Khalad arrives and there are troops, he will move to engage them.[-][/c]
[c][ff0000]He CAN be killed, so try to cover him.[-][/c] [c][6bd600]If he dies, he will respawn after a minute.[-][/c]
[c][6bd600][-][/c]
[c][ffff00][b]SKIP[/b][-][/c][c][ffff00]: You can manually skip the attack on the convoy if you've already destroyed the convoy outside the mission.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]However you cannot progress through the mission without handing the Demolition charges to Khalad at the Tank.[-][/c]
[b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]I'm here, but I can't see you.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]I'm on the inner side of the Communications vehicle.[-][/c]

Khalad is currently hiding by the Communications Vehicle on the left side of the convoy.
[c][ff0000]Clear the area before you try to talk to him or you risk being shot.[-][/c]
[c][ff0000][-][/c]
[b][c][ffff00]SKIP[-][/c][/b][c][ffff00]: You can manually skip the attack on the convoy if you've already destroyed the convoy outside the mission.[-][/c]
[c][ffff00]However you cannot progress through the mission without handing the Demolition charges to Khalad at the Tank.[-][/c]
The Lead Vehicle has a box of explosives on the back.\nKhalad wants at least 6 Demo Charges; you can keep the rest of what's in the box for yourself.
[c][2eafff]Hey, there's a [-][/c][c][ff0000]Zirax Rocket Launcher[-][/c][c][2eafff] in here.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]If that drone comes back, it could be useful...[-][/c]

[b][c][ff0000]WARNING:[-][/c][/b][c][ffff00] If Khalad has not spawned (Because you blew up the convoy early) then you will need to bring the charges to Khalad at The Tank.[-][/c]\n[c][ffff00]All other subsequent tasks up to reaching the drone base can be skipped manually.[-][/c]
[b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffee00]Watch out! It's a Drone Gunship![-][/c]

Drone Gunships are typically used on planets with mountainous terrain and thin atmosphere. They use an array of jet thrusters to maintain altitude while remaining relatively quiet.
Their slow speed is attributed to their heavy armor and large weapons.

[c][ffee00]Keep behind cover and use the Zirax Rocket Launcher you found in the cargo to take it down.[-][/c]
[c][ff0000]If you've lost your launcher, there is one in each vehicle.[-][/c]
[c][2eafff]Let's get out of here, Khalad. Before they send another one![-][/c]

[b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]
[c][ffffff]Not yet! I've set the spare charges on the transports.[-][/c]
[c][ffee00]Prime the detonators on [i]these [/i]two and make a run for it[-][/c][c][ffffff]. [-][/c]
[c][ffffff]The explosion should distract anything they send after us for a while.[-][/c]
Pull the lever on both demo charges and then run.

[b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]Okay, that should keep them preoccupied for a while.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]We'll make our way to the [-][/c][c][ff5c5c]Drone Base[-][/c][c][ffffff] while they're investigating.[-][/c]

[b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]I'll move on ahead and use the demo charges to blow open the wall.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]You follow up behind me and clear out the guards and disable the shields.[-][/c]

[b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]
[c][ffffff]Those make-shift turrets on the Drone Base can't point down, so [-][/c][c][ffee00]STAY LOW[-][/c][c][ffffff].[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Stick to the lowlands and valleys, avoid the heavy patrols and i'll see you around the back side of the Drone Base.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Khalad out.[-][/c]
[c][2eafff]Do you think it's possible to reach the Drone Base on foot, IDA?[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]I've seen those turrets in action, so I know what they can do to a ship.[-][/c]

[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]From the schematics I have determined that the Imperial Laser Turrets[-][/c][c][00ffee] lack a firing depression that would allow them to engage small targets close to the ground.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]Khalad's judgment on the matter is correct.[-][/c]

[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]You should be able to get beneath the Base's firing arc on foot or a motorcycle.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]I calculate a 46.1% chance of detection and a 33.3% chance of failure.[-][/c]
Approach the Drone Base to the safe distance of 750 meters and await Khalad's transmission.

[b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]I moved on ahead and blew open the wall of the drone base.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]I'm currently pinned down behind some cargo containers while half the base investigate.[-][/c]
[c][2eafff]I'll follow you through and deal with the troopers. You stay hidden until I get there.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]See if you can find a terminal and find out what they're up to if possible.[-][/c]
Keep below the range of the Drone Base's weapons.
[c][2eafff]I see the breach in the outer wall.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]I'll be there in a minute, just hold tight.[-][/c]

The Demolition Charges used by Khalad are designed to apply tremendous force without the use of conventional incendiary explosives. Making them ideal for use in space and for explosive mining on reactive materials such as Pentaxid which could trigger a fission explosion if detonated.
As such, they are capable of breaking down buildings without impacting a shield.

[b][c][ff0000]Enter the hole in the Drone Base's outer wall[-][/c][/b]
[b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]I'm safe where I am.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]But you won't be able to take out those sentry guns while the shields are still up.[-][/c]

[b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffee00][b]Turn left[/b][-][/c][c][ffffff] inside the wall and you'll come to a [-][/c][b][c][ffee00]Capacitor Bank[-][/c][/b][c][ffffff].[-][/c]\n[b][c][ffee00]Pull the lever[-][/c][/b][c][ffffff] on them to cut the power to the shields, then it'll all be downhill from there.[-][/c]

The shields are being fed by a capacitor bank left of the breach.\nPull the lever on the capacitor bank to shut down power to the shield generator and turn it off. Then you'll be free to destroy the sentry guns and spawner pads.
[c][2eafff]Shields are down![-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]Time to move in and take the base. I'll head for the control room.[-][/c]
[b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]I'll take care of these turrets and meet you up there.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff][i]Try [/i]to leave some of these bastards for me.[-][/c]

The Drone Base has 3 upper levels and only 1 underground level.\nUnlike a complete Xenu Drone Base that has 3 underground levels, this drone base is still under construction with many temporary measures included in it that are why it's been so easily to get this far.\n[c][ff0000]The Control Room is located at the top of the tower.[-][/c]
[c][2eafff]I've reached the Control Room. Engaging hostiles.[-][/c]
[b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]Take care of the stragglers and activate the elevator. I'll catch up with you in a second.[-][/c]
The Elevator is controlled by two levers on opposite sides of the Control Room.\nBoth must be pulled in order to progress.
[b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]Come over here and take a look at this console.[-][/c]
[c][2eafff]Damn you're sneaky...[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]I didn't even hear you come up here.[-][/c]
Khalad is in front of the main terminal in front of the Elevator.\n\n[c][ff0000]If Khalad has not appeared, you may need to leave the room.[-][/c]
[b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]Before you go, my friend...[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]Would you mind stepping up to that window? I have a surprise that you might like.[-][/c]
Khalad has a surprise for you.
[c][2eafff]How'd you manage [i]that[/i]?[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]Did you divert all the power to the turrets or something?[-][/c]

[b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]While I was waiting for you, I placed a couple of spare Demolition Charges on each of the base's turrets.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]It didn't seem right to just [i]leave [/i]them like that.[-][/c]
[c][2eafff]It was a nice surprise.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]Very thoughtful of you, Khalad.[-][/c]
[b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]I don't think the zirax will appreciate it though.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]Oh well, i'll let you get on with it.[-][/c]
The Drone Base uses a Retractible Elevator instead of a Gravplated Elevator.\nYou must stand on the Elevator and activate it for it to move.

[b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]You won't believe what i've found.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]Pull that door release and come into the [-][/c][c][ffee00]Holding Cells[-][/c][c][ffffff]. [-][/c][c][ff5c5c]Watch your back though, there's still a guard left.[-][/c]
There is a door release lever next to the door.
Speak to Khalad once the room is secure
[c][ffffff][b]Choose what do to with the prisoners[/b][-][/c]\n[c][bdbdbd]Your choices will be finalized when you leave the room.[-][/c]
Pull the lever to Torv's cell to free him
Pull the lever to Geam's Cell to free him.
Open the door, walk in there and shoot him in the head.

Once you leave the room, your choices are finalized and all subsequent actions will be considered permanent.\nBut still... don't go back and shoot the people after you've saved them. Especially Torv, he's great. He'll only respawn at his clone chamber and he'll be back later in all sorts of stupid jams that needs you to rescue him from in future.
[b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]For what it's worth, I believe you did the right thing.[-][/c]
[c][2eafff]Let's just finish the mission.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]The system core should be up ahead and once it's destroyed we can leave this place.[-][/c]
The System Core is the heart of the Drone Base. Once it is disabled, it will no longer be able to launch drones or troop transports.
[c][2eafff]I've located the System Core.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]It's only guarded by autonomous defenses. We must've depopulated the entire base.[-][/c]

[b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]The core is shielded.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]There should be a [-][/c][c][ffee00]core access terminal[-][/c][c][ffffff] in the room that will give you access to the core's systems and let you initiate a [-][/c][c][ff0000]Core Purge[-][/c][c][ffffff].[-][/c]

Inside the System Core Room is a console used to control the core in the event that the Drone Base goes into lockdown and the core is cut off from external inputs to prevent attempts at hacking or modifying data.\nThis console is the only way to access the System Core in this state and is used to either remove the lockdown or to initiate a Core Purge in the event of a takeover by a hostile entity like The Legacy.
[c][ffee00][b]< Core Purge Initiated >[/b][-][/c]\n[b][c][ffee00]System Core will Self-Destruct in 10 seconds[-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffee00][b]Vacate System Core[/b][-][/c]
Leave the system core room. The Self-destruct system will activate after leaving the room.\nIf it does not, you will have to auto-complete the task.
[b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]We are victorious![-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]Finally, my people will be free![-][/c]

[b][c][6bd600][ Khalad ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]I will... take care of things here and meet you back at the tank, my friend.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]There is much to do now and many preparations to begin.[-][/c]

Return to the Ruined Water Tank and meet with Khalad.\n\nYou can dismantle the Drone Base. However, if you are playing on a server it is recommended to leave some blocks so that it can regenerate for other players.
Khalad is on the lowest level of the tank.
[c][2eafff]You know what, IDA?[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]I think Khalad's going to be alright for now and the future of the Tal'on on this planet is in good hands.[-][/c]
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]I agree, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]That is provided his uncle can find him a suitable companion to keep his attention on village life.[-][/c]
[c][2eafff]Give the poor guy a break![-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]He's only just become chief. He needs a little time before he gets a shock like that.[-][/c]

This marks the final Chapter of the [c][6bd600][b]Tal'on Story Missions[/b][-][/c] (for now)
The next chain of Tal'on Missions will resume with the addition of the Ocean Planet: Ampathos in around v1.7

This story chain was written by [c][ff5c5c]Vermillion[-][/c], CEO of Forge Aerospace, Creator of Reforged Galaxy.

[c][ffee00][b]Chapter 2: Cloak and Dagger[/b][-][/c]

You've gotten yourself involved with a lone-wolf band of pirates headed by one Markos Vatar. A paranoid and rude sort of guy with a vendetta against Polaris.
There's a big heist in the works and if you can earn their trust, you can get a spot on the team for the big score.

[c][c0c0c0]* * *[-][/c]
[u][c][ffee00][b]PIRATE STORYLINE[/b][-][/c][/u]
[c][c0c0c0]Chapter 1: Unlawful Possession[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]Chapter 2: Cloak and Dagger[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]Chapter 3: Inside Job[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]Chapter 4: Assault and Battery[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]Chapter 5: Rival Syndicate[-][/c]
[c][c0c0c0]Chapter 6: A Debt To Pay[-][/c]

[c][ffee00][b]Chapter 2: Cloak and Dagger[/b][-][/c]

You've gotten yourself involved with a lone-wolf band of pirates headed by one Markos Vatar. A paranoid and rude sort of guy with a vendetta against Polaris.
There's a big heist in the works and if you can earn their trust, you can get a spot on the team for the big score.
[c][2eafff]IDA, can you open a channel to Markos.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]I think it's about time we talked about that "other job"[-][/c]

[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]Commander, You are already a ranking member of the UCH. You do not need further employment.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]I recommend against any additional dealings with criminals.[-][/c]

[c][2eafff]Noted, IDA.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]But these criminals could open the door for us into Pirate information networks and supply lines for the fleet.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]We don't have a lot of leads [i]or [/i]friends out here, so every bit helps.[-][/c]
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]I do not agree your choices, Commander. But I do understand them.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]Opening a com channel to [-][/c][c][ff0000]The Red Rogue[-][/c]
[b][c][ffae00][ Markos ][-][/c][/b]\nWhy are you contacting me [i]now[/i]? I'm a busy many, you know?\nI don't have time to mess with small fry like you.
[c][2eafff]That's kinda rude, Markos.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]You said something about a big job, and since you're so busy I figured you could use some help with it.[-][/c]

[b][c][ffae00][ Markos ][-][/c][/b]\nI did say that, didn't I?\nWhat I [i]didn't [/i]say was that [i]you [/i]could be a part of it though, did I? [i]But [/i]since you're volunteering to go run errands for me, you [i]could [/i]be useful after all.

[b][c][ffae00][ Markos ][-][/c][/b]
Alright... We'll see how you do on this "errand" i've got for you.
Come to the [c][ff0000]Red Rogue[-][/c] and speak to my helmsman, [c][ffee00]Garrison[-][/c] for the details.
Red Rogue Out.

The Red Rogue is a Charon-Class Freighter stolen from a Polaris impound yard after it's former owners were sentenced to a Debtor's Prison.
Markos refitted the hull and converted it into a smuggling ship with a hired crew and has spent the last few years hitting Polaris shipments with it.

[b][c][ff0000]The Red Rogue is currently located in the Starting Orbit.[-][/c][/b]
[c][ffee00]It is not detectible to radar and scans, you will need to rely on the mission waypoint to find it.[-][/c]
[b][c][ff0000][ Red Rogue ][-][/c][/b]\n[i][c][bdbdbd]You're cleared to land on the top deck, newbie. Don't break anything.[-][/c][/i]

[c][00ffee][b][ Helmsman ][/b][-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]Hey there, Newbie! I'm Garrison.[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]Come on up here to the [-][/c][c][ffee00]bridge [-][/c][c][ffffff]for the deets on your job.[-][/c]

Garrison is the Helmsman of the Red Rogue. Uncharacteristically, he's a friendly and upbeat guy and an excellent pilot.
Unfortunately, he suffers from a warped sense of humor and has a bad habit of playing practical jokes on the crew of the Red Rogue that tend to go overboard.
One of these days, he's going to push Vespian too far and then [i]he's[/i] going to end up overboard.

[c][ff0000]Garrison can be found on the Bridge of the Red Rogue[-][/c]

[b][c][ffae00][ Markos ][-][/c][/b]\nI'm sure Garrison already told you, but [i]don't screw this up[/i].\nWe need that data or we're dead in the water and it'll be another two months before another shipments comes through.

Kenex Station is one of several dozen virtually identical stations found across the galaxy. It's a major resupplying port for both Civilian and Military crafts.\nThe lower levels are given over to industrial, commercial and entertainment use, while the upper levels function as communication and security for the local division of PolSec.
[c][2eafff]Come in Kenex Station.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]Polaris number [-][/c][c][ffffff]#8376455466[-][/c][c][2eafff] requesting permission to dock. Over.[-][/c]
[b][c][ffae00][ Coms Chief ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]Welcome back #8376455466[-][/c]\n[c][ffffff]Dock at the assigned back. Over.[-][/c]
[b][c][ffffff]Fun Fact:[-][/c][/b] The docking permission sequence is based on the sequence from another alpha game called "Between the Stars" that occurs while approaching any Allied Station.
[c][84bce6][i]The Package should be in one of the Men's Toilets upstairs in the food court.[/i][-][/c]
You'll notice that the toilets are being called "Toilets" and not "Bathrooms".\nThat's because there's no bath in there and many toilets.
[c][2eafff]Ugh... some fat bastard left a floater![-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]No sign of the package though. Could someone have found it?[-][/c]
[c][2eafff]IDA, Open a channel to the [-][/c][c][ff5c5c]Red Rogue[-][/c][c][2eafff].[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]We have a [i]serious [/i]problem here.[-][/c]
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]I have located the contact, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]He is currently in his room on the opposite side of the main hangar and down one floor.[-][/c]

A fence is a slang term for someone who sells stolen goods.\nThis particular fence deals primarily in illegal weaponry and equipment. He is known to purchase broken Experimental Weapons and repair them at great and sell them to collectors for even greater profits.
[c][2eafff]The package was taken from the Food Court Toilets, so there should be security recordings from outside of everyone that came and left.[-][/c]

[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]I'm still hooked into the station's public communications systems, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]The Floor Manager that you've spoken to before should have the recordings for the public areas.[-][/c]

The Floor Manager is the poor guy everyone goes to see when they ask to see the manager. He's overworked, underpaid and under close scrutiny by security to ensure he's not corrupt.\nHe can be found in his office in the main hall, opposite the food court.
[c][2eafff]IDA, things have just gone from bad to worse.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]Of all the people to find the package, it just happens to be the one person who'll be able to identify what it is.[-][/c]

[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00ffee]I heard, Commander.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]I have already tagged the employee's residence on your display.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]He is scheduled to leave for his lunch break in 4 minutes. You will need to hurry.[-][/c]

A member of PolSec's admin staff specializing in hardware analysis has picked up the Decryption Device and taken it to his apartment.\nReach his apartment before he leaves his station for lunch and returns home.
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]Wait, Commander![-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]It seems Administrator Yeven left his post early and has already returned home for his lunch. You are too late.[-][/c]
[c][2eafff]Is there any way to lure him out long enough to get in there and find the package?[-][/c]

[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]There is a [-][/c][c][ffffff]docking console[-][/c][c][00ffee] on the underside of the [-][/c][c][ffffff]main landing apron[-][/c][c][00ffee].\nIf you shut down the magnetic locks, it should cause an incident sufficient enough to recall him.[-][/c]
[c][2eafff]Let's go with that plan then.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]If he takes it to security, the entire job will be screwed.[-][/c]

Located underneath the Main Landing Apron are a set of consoles used to control the magnetic docking of ships and cargo to the platform.\nBy disabling one of the locks, the cargo on one of the platforms will drift free and collide with the station and incoming crafts.\nAdministrator Yeven will be called back to his post to assess whether it was a hardware failure, software error and intentional sabotage.

[b][c][ff0000][u]WARNING!![/u][-][/c][/b]
[c][ffae00]You are attempting to shut down the magnetic docking clamps that are used to keep Cargo Containers attached to Cargo Pad 01.[-][/c]
[c][ffae00]This system must only be disabled in the event of injury to Polaris or Civilian personnel trapped between a container and the station's hull.[-][/c]
[c][ffee00]Any other situation is punishable under Station Law 174836001-A[-][/c]

[b][c][ff0000]Do you wish to confirm?[-][/c][/b]

[c][ffee00][b]< WARNING !! >[/b][-][/c]
[c][ffae00]Damage to Polaris Property detected![-][/c]
[c][ffae00]Untethered objects at Cargo Pad 01.[-][/c]
[c][ffae00]Magnetic Cargo Locks non-responsive.[-][/c]
With the cargo loose, Administrator Yeven will be called back to his post to investigate the cause.\nThis will give you the chance to enter his apartment and retrieve the package.

[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]
[c][00ffee]It appears to have worked, Commander.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]Commander Yeven has returned to the Com Deck, leaving his rooms unattended.[-][/c]
[c][00ffee]The code to his door is [-][/c][c][ffee00]6563[-][/c]
Administrator Yeven brought the package back to his rooms. It should be here somewhere. If it's not... maybe you should try checking the computer.
[c][2eafff]Okay, IDA.\nCan you show me the way to the server room and display on my suit display the... obstacles? This isn't going to be straightforward...[-][/c]

[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]I have added a waypoint to your Heads-Up Display and included the negative conditions for completion.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]May I remind you that I advised you to avoid taking jobs from pirates.[-][/c]

[b][c][ffffff]Reach the Server Room:[-][/c][/b] The Server Room is on the second floor of the control room at the far side of the Food Court.\nIt is heavily guarded with troops ordered to shoot on sight.

[b][c][ff0000]Avoid Being Seen:[-][/c][/b] Attempting to scale the security wall to access the upper level of the Control Room is the shortest way to the Server Room, but it is in full view of everyone. You will set off ALL the alarms if you do.
[b][c][ffffff]Find a way into the control room[-][/c][/b]

[b][c][ffffff]Find a way into the control room: [-][/c][/b]The main door is locked and guarded. There is probably another entrance somewhere.\nIf there's a code to be known, you can be sure there's a criminal on the station who knows it.
[c][2eafff]This looks like it accesses the back of the Control Room.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]It appears to be locked. Maybe someone knows the code?[-][/c]
[c][2eafff]Okay, i'm in. I don't see any loose device though.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]They must've slotted it into one of the Station's Servers.[-][/c]
The Station Servers have the Decryptor plugged into it somewhere. You'll need to pull out each server and search for the device manually.

[b][c][2eafff]KNX Server Terminal:[-][/c][/b]

[c][ffee00]Unrecognized device in Rack41-Slot6[-][/c]
[c][ff0000][b]Unable to read/write file format![/b][-][/c]
[c][00ffee]Please remove device and reconfigure drivers before reinstalling device.[-][/c]

[b][c][ffffff]Eject Rack41?[-][/c][/b]

[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]I'm concerned that a Hardware Analyst would connect an unknown and potentially harmful device to the station's main computer.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]Please don't [i]ever [/i]do that to me, Commander.[-][/c]
[c][2eafff]Okay, I've got the package.[-][/c]\n[c][2eafff]Let's get out of here and back to the [-][/c][c][ffee00]Trading Floor[-][/c][c][2eafff] and contact Garrison.[-][/c]
The Trading Floor is located outside Ok'y Medical.\nDon't be seen while exiting the Control Room.

[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]I have added the civilian [-][/c][c][ffffff]Spaceport's Airlock[-][/c][c][00ffee] to your display, Commander.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]There are other exits from the station that are also viable, but these are the closest to the Transceiver.[-][/c]
[b][c][ffffff]Find the Airlock:[-][/c][/b] The Airlock is located at the Civilian Spaceport on either side of the main terminal.

[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]Commander, you have reached the Airlock.[-][/c]\n[c][00ffee]Once outside, you will be visible to anyone in the station's Operations Room if you rise higher than the white line below the Transceiver.[-][/c]

[b][c][2eafff]Locate the Data Relay:[-][/c][/b] The Data Relay is located beneath the Station's Transceiver above it. It filters and collates data received from incoming and outgoing transmissions before transferring it to the appropriate system.
[c][2eafff]Okay, i've attached the Device. Let's get back to the hangar and head back to the Red Rogue before someone notices anything.[-][/c]

[c][ff0000][b]Avoid Detection:[/b][-][/c] Rising above the white lines on the platform below the Transceiver will put you within clear view of the station personnel inside the Operation's Room, which will quite obviously impact your standing with Polaris.
[b][c][ffee00][ IDA ][-][/c][/b]\n[c][00ffee]Marking the Red Rogue's last known location on your display, Commander.[-][/c]

The Red Rogue is a Charon-Class Freighter stolen from a Polaris impound yard after it's former owners were sentenced to a Debtor's Prison.
Markos refitted the hull and converted it into a smuggling ship with a hired crew and has spent the last few years hitting Polaris shipments with it.

[c][ff0000][b]The Red Rogue is currently located in the Starting Orbit.[/b][-][/c]
[c][ffee00]It is not detectible to radar and scans, you will need to rely on the mission waypoint to find it.[-][/c]
[c][ff0000][b][ Red Rogue ][/b][-][/c]\n[i][c][bdbdbd]You're cleared to land on the top deck, newbie. Watch out for the cargo on the pad.[-][/c][/i]

Garrison is the Helmsman of the Red Rogue. Uncharacteristically, he's a friendly and upbeat guy and an excellent pilot.
Unfortunately, he suffers from a warped sense of humor and has a bad habit of playing practical jokes on the crew of the Red Rogue that tend to go overboard.
One of these days, he's going to push Vespian too far and then [i]he's[/i] going to end up overboard.

[c][ff0000]Garrison can be found on the Bridge of the Red Rogue[-][/c]
[b][c][ffae00][ Markos ][-][/c][/b]\nGarrison says you did alright in there, [c][2eafff]Blue[-][/c].\nIf you want in on the job, you're in.

[b][c][ffae00][ Markos ][-][/c][/b]\nWe've got some time to kill before the real thing, so you can go back to whatever you were doing and we'll call you is something comes up.\n[c][ff0000]Markos out.[-][/c]

[b][c][ff5c5c]The big heist won't be coming up for a while.[-][/c][/b]

In the meantime, Garrison has some small-time missions for you to tackle that'll bring in some much-needed money, resources and reputation with the other pirates.
I'm sure that when you've completed enough of them, you'll be notified when the big Heist is available.
[c][ffee00][b]Warning!![/b][-][/c]\n[c][ffee00]Zirax have detected the construction of a Capital Vessel and have deployed a pre-emptive strike![-][/c]
Zirax Interception occurs when the player constructs a CV on the starter planet.
One Minigun Drone, Rocket Drone and Light Bomber have been deployed to deal with your new ship.

[b][c][00ffee]To dig up the Antenna:[-][/c][/b]
[c][ffffff]- Place the Survival Multitool into your Toolbar.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]- Select the Survival Multitool[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]- Press RMB and Select Mining Mode[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]- Fire the Survival Tool at the ground to excavate it[-][/c]

The Survival Tool consumes no fuel and is average against Sand, Snow and Dirt.
It will suffer severe speed penalties against harder ore deposits in the ground.
[c][6bd600]It is recommended to upgrade to a Mechanical Drill (Unlock in the Tech Tree F3) as soon as possible.[-][/c]

[b][c][00ffee]To excavate the Antenna:[-][/c][/b]
[c][ffffff]- Place the Survival Multitool into your Toolbar.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]- Select the Survival Multitool to equip it[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]- Press RMB and Select Mining Mode[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]- Fire the Survival Tool at the ground to excavate it[-][/c]

The Survival Tool requires no fuel but is slow at mining anything harder than dirt or cracking surface rocks.
Survival Multitools are disassembled and stored in your suit's constructor and can be reconstructed at any time for no cost.
[c][6bd600]It is recommended to upgrade to a Mechanical Drill (Unlock in the Tech Tree F3) as soon as possible.[-][/c]
[c][bdbdbd]I've found the Antenna's access port and console.[-][/c]\n[c][bdbdbd]I should be able to hook my suit up to it and boost the signal[-][/c]
[b][c][ffee00]Ilmarinen Self-Destruct Sequence Activated[-][/c][/b]\n[b][c][ffee00]You have 2 minutes to evacuate the ship[-][/c][/b]
You shouldn't even be able to read this.\nThis is a temporary self-destruct message used for ending the Ilmarinen Dungeon in lieu of an actual mission.
[b][c][ffee00]Unidentified vessels detected exiting warp![-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffae00]All hands to battle stations![-][/c]

[c][ffff00]Pirate Story Missions can only be unlocked after encountering the pirates in the Main Story Mission quest line (The Cruel Stars).[-][/c]
[c][ffae00][-][/c]
[c][ffae00][-][/c][c][a6ff00][-][/c][c][ffae00][-][/c][c][0088ff]At present, there are only a couple of Pirate Story Missions but more will be added as time goes on. These missions take a long time and a lot of work to build and for them to function in both MP and SP.[-][/c]
[c][0088ff]There are of course, plenty of issues in MP with signal-controlled events.[-][/c]
This acts as an information tab in the PDA for those looking for Pirate missions

[c][ffffff]The main story missions will eventually run the length of the game introducing each faction and giving the option of pursuing their individual storylines to their conclusion.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][0088ff]The main story will follow the player as they seek to find and rejoin the UCH Fleet. The condition of the player and the fleet when you eventually get there will depend on your actions.[-][/c]
[c][0088ff]The story is not rigid and at many intersections you will be given choices that will shape the eventual outcome of the story.[-][/c]
[c][ff0000]When you reach the final conclusion, will you be a hero?[-][/c]
This acts as an information heading for the Main Story Missions.

[c][ffffff]The [-][/c][b][c][00ffff]Character Class System (CSS)[-][/c][/b][c][ffffff] allows the player to select a Skill Class for their character that will amplify their combat effectiveness using a chosen set of weapons.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]By activating this mission for the first time you will automatically open the class selection window.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Once you have chosen your Main Class, activating this mission again will display your current skill efficiency and level.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Upon reaching Class Level 5, you will be able to choose a Sub-Class that will provide new skills and new abilities.[-][/c]

[b][c][0088ff]Class: Soldier - Level 1 (Recruit)[-][/c][/b]

[c][ffffff]You've passed advanced training and are competent in the use of firearms in practice. What you need now is experience.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]In order to live up to your position of a UCH Security Officer, it's high-time you went and got that experience.[-][/c]

[b][c][00ff00]Rank-up Condition:[-][/c][/b]
[b][c][ffa000]Kill 50[-][/c][/b][c][ffffff] Zirax Troopers (any kind)[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Use any Assault Rifle or Pulse Rifle[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c][c][ff0000][b]- This mission must be active -[/b][-][/c]

It's time to get some first-hand experience fighting against the zirax in life-or-death, battlefield conditions.

Practice makes perfect. But it's time to see if you're up to the challenge.

[b][c][ff0000]Does not include Drones, Ripperdogs, Mechanoids, Assault Zirax, Zirax Commanders or Elite Troopers.[-][/c][/b]
[b][c][ffff00]Rank-up Conditions have been met![-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]Find a [u]safe place[/u] and open your [b]PDA (F1)[/b] to confirm your change to Rank 2 (Cadet).[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Find a safe place and open your PDA (F1) to complete this objective and confirm your rank up to Rank 2 - Cadet[-][/c]

[b][c][0088ff]Class: Soldier - Level 2 (Cadet)[-][/c][/b]

[c][ffffff]You've established yourself as a capable soldier and a presence on the battlefield with enough experience to tackle harder and stronger enemies.[-][/c]

[b][c][00ff00]Rank-up Condition:[-][/c][/b]
[b][c][ffa000]Kill 100[-][/c][/b][c][ffffff] Zirax Troopers (any kind)[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Use any Assault Rifle or Pulse Rifle[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ff0000][b]- This mission must be active -[/b][-][/c]

You've had your first experience at battlefield conditions. It's time to reinforce what you've learned and commit it to muscle memory. Once you've got that down to a fine art, you'll be ready to move up to the next rank.\n\n[b][c][ff0000]Does not include Drones, Ripperdogs, Mechanoids, Assault Zirax, Zirax Commanders or Elite Troopers.[-][/c][/b]
[b][c][ffff00]Rank-up Conditions have been met![-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]Find a [u]safe place[/u] and open your [b]PDA (F1)[/b] to confirm your change to Rank 3 (Ensign).[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Find a safe place and open your PDA (F1) to complete this objective and confirm your rank up to Rank 3 - Ensign[-][/c]

[b][c][0088ff]Class: Soldier - Level 3 (Ensign)[-][/c][/b]

[c][ffffff]You're now a primary asset on the battlefield, able to identify and eliminate a hostile target with practiced ease.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]But these low-level cloned soldiers aren't the threat they once represented. It's their commanders that will be a real test of skill.[-][/c]

[b][c][00ff00]Rank-up Condition:[-][/c][/b]
[b][c][ffa000]Kill 35[-][/c][/b][c][ffffff] Elite Zirax Troopers or Commanders[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Use any Assault Rifle or Pulse Rifle[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ff0000][b]- This mission must be active -[/b][-][/c]

You can put as many cloned soldiers into the ground as you like, but you'll never put a dent into the enemy's command.
It's time to take the fight to the team leaders and base commanders.

[b][c][ff0000]Elite Zirax can be found in space stations and some high-difficulty Military Bases.[-][/c][/b]
[c][ff0000][b]A Zirax Commander can be found in most Zirax facilities.[/b][-][/c]
[b][c][ffff00]Rank-up Conditions have been met![-][/c][/b]\n[c][ffffff]Find a [u]safe place[/u] and open your [b]PDA (F1)[/b] to confirm your change to Rank 4 (Lieutenant).[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Find a safe place and open your PDA (F1) to complete this objective and confirm your rank up to Rank 4 - Lieutenant[-][/c]

[b][c][0088ff]Class: Soldier - Level 4 (Lieutenant)[-][/c][/b]

[c][ffffff]Congratulations on holding both the title of UCH Commander and Lieutenant of the UCH Security Forces. There are few in the UCH Navy that have achieved such levels of recognition.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff]But it's not enough... There is still more work to do.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c][b][c][00ff00]Rank-up Condition:[-][/c][/b]
[b][c][ffa000]Destroy the core of 10[-][/c][/b][c][ffffff] Zirax Bases[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ff0000][b]- This mission must be active -[/b][-][/c]

Commanders and Elites are no chance against a seasoned veteran like yourself. It's time to take the fight to them and push them clean off the planets and leave their territory free for the safe return of the UCH Fleet.

[b][c][00ff00]Applies only to ground-based bases belonging to either the Zirax Empire or one of the many houses that make it up.[-][/c][/b]
[c][ff0000][b]Does not include spacestations, defense towers or bases on the low-level starting planets.[/b][-][/c]
[c][ff0000][b]Cores must be destroyed by hand.[/b][-][/c]

[b][c][ff0000]Sub-Class: Agent - Level 1 (Recruit)[-][/c][/b]

[c][ffffff]You've already mastered your first class role, but you're a comparative novice when it comes to weapons and tools outside your current field of expertise.[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Just like before, you'll need to start from the ground up only harder.[-][/c]

[b][c][00ff00]Rank-up Condition:[-][/c][/b]
[b][c][ffa000]Kill 100[-][/c][/b][c][ffffff] Zirax Troopers (any kind)[-][/c]
[c][ffffff]Use any Pistol, Laser Pistol or Submachine Gun[-][/c]
[c][ffffff][-][/c]
[c][ff0000][b]- This mission must be active -[/b][-][/c]

It's time to get some first-hand experience fighting against the zirax in life-or-death, battlefield conditions.

Practice makes perfect. But it's time to see if you're up to the challenge.

[b][c][ff0000]Does not include Drones, Ripperdogs, Mechanoids, Assault Zirax, Zirax Commanders or Elite Troopers.[-][/c][/b]
